Text.val: Optional parameters (just filled by call from CredMan):
Author: Jerry Janssens (JJ)
Creation date: 19.09.2001
05.02.2014 GB SCR18692 Added 1.13 Checkbox Manual Verification
07.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901

04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)

in the case "Change of Y to N is only allowed if DCLV_DATVERIFICATION = date()"
and I set Allowed modify = Yes in the task Invoice table

DCLV_NOTVERIFIEDREASON have a value
04.05.2011 SH SCR16429 ReplacedGB002 by GB902
05.03.2011 GB SCR15757 Replaced the logic to retrieve the radio button labels
via LinkQuery on table COCO by program GB306
22.09.2006 JJ SCR11941 Removed confirmation for Not OK wo. call ODC005
16.06.2006 JJ SCR11414 Delete button (if no open invoices) + std button handling
//02.02.2006 CO Floating screens dependend from Maigc.ini

2 additional optional parameters
(Also fixed a bug with problem initialization of v.What-to-do)

ODC005D.

10.1.2005 WJ SCR7617 select toggle only if DCLV_VERIFCODE = 1
//28-10-2004 JP SCR #7328 add paramter in call to ODC005D 'ChangeInvoices'
23.05.2003 JJ SCR3599 added row count to selection for ODC005
//07-05-2003 JP request HS: replace first param to GM900B with string 'OAD201'
-- before it was a varibale
10.12.2002 JJ SCR2657 cont. fixed bugs
- Added flag v.ODC005RowsSelected which is set true when any rows are marked
as selected for ODC005D in this case ODC005D will not clear the selection
and will have activate the buttons immediately
09.12.2002 JJ SCR2657 cont.added new parameter to call ODC005
05.12.2002 JJ SCR2657 Major revision
-markcodes no longer modifiable in this program
-Added CheckbBox "NotOk"
-Added fiield for reason not Ok
- Added call ODC005 for handling of invoices which are NotOk
- dropped remarks input/handling
- Added options to select VerifResult for button Allinvoices
20.11.2002 JJ SCR2537 added check box for instr a website
08/09.08.2002 JJ SCR1838 fixed check on mandatory entry
29.07.2002 JJ SCR1711 cont. added refresh of invoice table (call and close task)
26.07.2002 JJ SCR1711 cont. fixed bug in link write for RemaininingSelectionOk
22.07.2002 JJ SCR1711 added marking of all remaining (selected) invoices OK
06.05.2002 JJ SCR1199 changed validation/selection markcodespec (exclude type 2)
15.04.2002 JJ SCR#1114 added virtual to replace MULT_TAGGED
on screen (MULT_TAGGED is null allowed)
- removed check for mandatory modification on invoice level
- changed force record suffix behavior of invoice table
- added Mult key code parameter to call of OID201A
Button label handling
If user is authorised check if the requested DCLV exists
ID0001 Verification not found
CO: Get window dimensions in case the program is used within CredMan:
Remove all remaining mult records
O: Online
C: Cancel, exit
S: Ok/Select OID201A
Validate selection
ID0008 Errors in invoice selection (more than 1 check box)
ID0010 Not verified/Not Ok invoices require a reason
Send user back online
If ok, handle results and close task
M: Change invoices, Activate OID005D
Build selection for ODC005D
D: Delete
VerifCode Phone/Mail is display only, no need for the second link
Selection of next screen by radio button
Default: Leave the screen open after leaving the task:
In case the program is used within CredMan, save the window dimensions:
Handler in enabled for CredMan calls only!
Close Event is PROPAGETED! It Exists the task.
Tell the upper task to close the window now:
If the call came not from CredMan, closing is done in old way:
If the call came from CredMan, closing is done via an Handler:
If the call came not from CredMan, closing is done in old way:
If the call came from CredMan, closing is done via an Handler:

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OID201]: Enter the results of verifications')

Text.val: Only update if there was no MULT row yet
MultNum 1 and 2 were used for mark codes, not reused (prevent confusion)
Not Verified
Only update if there was no MULT row yet
No Verified
Not Ok
where clause INVO_AACTUALI<>0
Checkbox for selection, init with linkresult of LQ on DCVI
On change (RS), create/delete DCVI Line.
Option selected only integrated (no performance loss noticed)
05.12.2002 dropped change of markcode
MULT_NUM1 New MARKCODESPEC
MULT_NUM2 New MARKCODETEXT
MULT_NUM4 Indication NOT Ok
MULT_NUM3 Indication NOT verified
Tagged = OK
Keep MULT_NUMERIC3 synchronised with Screen var
Keep MULT_NUMERIC4 synchronised with Screen var
writing MULT is handled in link write deleting is not
Check open desc if highest amount <> 0
Check open asc if lowest amount <> 0
